name: Doom Curse of Tore. Episode 1: Tore Evilution
name_original: Doom Curse of Tore. Episode 1: Tore Evilution
description:
This is a custom doom wad made by Henrik and Johan, also known as TNT Software. Share it with your friends and make sure to comment!

The wad is not finished but will be updated soon! You can only play the 3 first maps and when the 4th level starts the game will close. But more updates soon!

DOOM Curse of Tore: Episode 1: Tore Evilution Is the first episode of the DOOM COT series. Blast your way killing demons and entering the Tore HELL dimension trough 10 maps and 2 secret maps. Kill demons the original DOOM way in this wad/mod created by TNT Software.

You should know the original Id Software`s DOOM games before playing.

Original Doom franchise created by Id Software.

-------------STORY--------------------------------------

The UAC (Union Aerospace Corporation) one day discoverd an unknown demon force from another hell dimension. It turns out that ist the Tore hell dimension, and it looks like Tore has sent his demons and monsters into earth! Earth is invaded by the hellish demons and monsters from the Tore dimension. The UAC sends you (Doomguy) trough a teleporter from the UAC Mars base to earth. Because you have fighed those things before, but now... its gonna be like DOOM...
